text: SEG Racing Academy is a Dutch UCI Continental team founded in 2015 that participates in UCI Continental Circuits races.http://www.procyclingstats.com/team/Seg_Racing_2015 ==Team roster== ==Major wins== ;2015 :Stage 3 Le Triptyque des Monts et Châteaux, Steven Lammertink :Arno Wallaard Memorial, Jasper Bovenhuis :Stage 4 Tour de Bretagne Cycliste, Alex Peters :Stage 2 (ITT) Tour de Berlin, Tour de Normandie, Julius Van den Berg :Stage 5 Le Tour de Bretagne Cycliste, Cees Bol :Stage 6 Le Tour de Bretagne Cycliste, Julius Van den Berg :Profronde van Noord-Holland, Julius van den Berg :Overall Ronde de l'Isard, Stephen Williams ::Stages 1 & 2, Stephen Williams :Prologue Giro Ciclistico d'Italia, Edoardo Affini :Midden-Brabant Poort Omloop, Julius Van den Berg :Stage 7 Giro Ciclistico d'Italia, Stephen Williams :Gooikse Pijl, Jordi Meeus :Paris-Tours Espoirs, Marten Kooistra ;2019 :Stage 2 Tour de Normandie, Alberto Dainese :Stage 5 Tour de Normandie, Barnabás Peák
